item.title: Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

thats easy. if the text within the box is clickable, add in clickingbuttons.java the action button id (you can find this buy looking in your cmd after clicking on the text) and have it move your player to the coordinates, set it up like this…
case ####://action button id
c.getPA().startTeleport(####, ####, #, “modern”);//(x-coord, y-coord, height, “spell”); leave spell alone
c.sendMessage(“message”);//change message to whatever you want to say when you tele
break;//add this to keep the buttons seperate

start with that

Read full topic

item.title: Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

the cache loader is easy to use. all it is just open your cache with the editor, go to change jagex files or w\e, then choose interface.jag and then itll open another screen, on that screen you’ll see a section called data which is your interface file, dump the file to your desktop and there you go. thats a start.

Read full topic

@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

ahh. well what you should do, use an interface maker\editor, and carefully edit out what you need. or even go on google and search different interfaces that are available with the sprites and the ints that go along with them. there is a bunch of neat ones out there.

item.title: Interface Help
item.dc:creator: @PriMaL_PvP PriMaL_PvP
item.description:
@PriMaL_PvP wrote:

Hey Guyds im Trying To add a New Interface And these are the errors i have gotten

Quote
RSInterface.java:1257: non-static variable textDrawingAreas cannot be referenced
from a static context
teleport(textDrawingAreas);
^
RSInterface.java:1257: teleport(TextDrawingArea[]) in RSInterface cannot be appl
ied to (TextDrawingArea)
teleport(textDrawingAreas);
^
Note: client.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlinteprecation for details.
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

This is my code
aClass44 = streamloader;
teleport(textDrawingAreas);

Read full topic
